verses.verse: The word<WH1697> which came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, when Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and all his army<WH2428>, and all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776> that were under his dominion<WH3027>, and all the peoples<WH5971>, were fighting<WH3898> against Jerusalem<WH3389>, and against all the cities<WH5892> thereof<WH559>, saying:

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, Go<WH1980>, and speak<WH559> to Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>, and tell<WH559> him<WH559>, Thus saith Jehovah<WH3068>, Behold<WH5414>, I will give this city<WH5892> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and he shall burn<WH8313> it with fire<WH784>:

and thou shalt not escape out<WH4422> of his hand<WH3027>, but shalt surely<WH8610> be taken<WH8610>, and delivered<WH5414> into his hand<WH3027>; and thine eyes<WH5869> shall behold<WH7200> the eyes<WH5869> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>, and he shall speak<WH1696> with thee mouth<WH6310> to mouth<WH6310>, and thou shalt go<WH935> to Babylon<WH894>.

Yet hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, O Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063>: thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> concerning thee<WH4191>, Thou shalt not die by the sword<WH2719>;

thou shalt die<WH4191> in peace<WH7965>; and with the burnings<WH4955> of thy fathers<WH1>, the former<WH7223> kings<WH4428> that were before<WH6440> thee<WH8313>, so shall they make a burning for thee<WH5594>; and they shall lament thee<WH1945>, saying, Ah Lord<WH113>! for I have spoken<WH1696> the word<WH1697>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
Then Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> spake<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> unto Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> in Jerusalem<WH3389>,

when the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>'s army<WH2428> was fighting<WH3898> against Jerusalem<WH3389>, and against all the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> that were left<WH3498>, against Lachish<WH3923> and against Azekah<WH5825>; for these alone remained<WH7604> of the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> as fortified<WH4013> cities<WH5892>.

The word<WH1697> that came unto Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, after<WH310> that the king<WH4428> Zedekiah<WH6667> had made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with all the people<WH5971> that were at Jerusalem<WH3389>, to proclaim<WH7121> liberty unto them<WH1865>;

that every man<WH376> should let his man-servant<WH5650>, and every man<WH376> his maid-servant<WH8198>, that is a Hebrew<WH5680> or a Hebrewess<WH5680>, go<WH7971> free<WH2670>; that none should make bondmen<WH5647> of them<WH3064>, to wit, of a Jew his brother<WH251>.

And all the princes<WH8269> and all the people<WH5971> obeyed<WH935>, that had entered into the covenant<WH1285>, that every one<WH376> should let his man-servant<WH5650>, and every one<WH376> his maid-servant<WH8198>, go<WH7971> free<WH2670>, that none should make bondmen<WH5647> of them any more<WH8085>; they obeyed, and let them go<WH7971>:

but afterwards<WH310> they turned<WH7725>, and caused the servants<WH5650> and the handmaids<WH8198>, whom they had let go<WH7971> free<WH2670>, to return<WH7725>, and brought them into subjection<WH3533> for servants<WH5650> and for handmaids<WH8198>.
Therefore the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came to Jeremiah<WH3414> from Jehovah<WH3068>, saying<WH559>,

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: I made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with your fathers<WH1> in the day<WH3117> that I brought them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>, saying<WH559>,

At the end<WH7093> of seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> ye shall let go<WH7971> every man<WH376> his brother<WH251> that is a Hebrew<WH5680>, that hath been sold<WH4376> unto thee<WH5647>, and hath served thee six<WH8337> years<WH8141>, thou shalt let him go<WH7971> free<WH2670> from thee<WH1>: but your fathers hearkened<WH8085> not unto me<WH5186>, neither inclined their ear<WH241>.

And ye were now<WH3117> turned<WH7725>, and had done<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> in mine eyes<WH5869>, in proclaiming<WH7121> liberty<WH1865> every man<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>; and ye had made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> before<WH6440> me in the house<WH1004> which is called<WH7121> by my name<WH8034>:

but ye turned<WH7725> and profaned<WH2490> my name<WH8034>, and caused every man<WH376> his servant<WH5650>, and every man<WH376> his handmaid<WH8198>, whom ye had let<WH7971> go free<WH2670> at their pleasure<WH5315>, to return<WH7725>; and ye brought them into subjection<WH3533>, to be unto you for servants<WH5650> and for handmaids<WH8198>.

Therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>: ye have not hearkened<WH8085> unto me<WH7121>, to proclaim liberty<WH1865>, every man<WH376> to his brother<WH251>, and every man<WH376> to his neighbor<WH7453>: behold<WH7121>, I proclaim unto you a liberty<WH1865>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, to the sword<WH2719>, to the pestilence<WH1698>, and to the famine<WH7458>; and I will make<WH5414> you to be tossed<WH2189> to and fro among all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776>.

And I will give<WH5414> the men<WH582> that have transgressed<WH5674> my covenant<WH1285>, that have not performed<WH6965> the words<WH1697> of the covenant<WH1285> which they made<WH3772> before<WH6440> me<WH3772>, when they cut the calf<WH5695> in twain<WH8147> and passed<WH5674> between the parts thereof<WH1335>;

the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063>, and the princes<WH8269> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, the eunuchs<WH5631>, and the priests<WH3548>, and all the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776>, that passed<WH5674> between the parts<WH1335> of the calf<WH5695>;

I will even give<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies<WH341>, and into the hand<WH3027> of them that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>; and their dead bodies<WH5038> shall be for food<WH3978> unto the birds<WH5775> of the heavens<WH8064>, and to the beasts<WH929> of the earth<WH776>.

And Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> and his princes<WH8269> will I give<WH5414> into the hand<WH3027> of their enemies<WH341>, and into the hand<WH3027> of them that seek<WH1245> their life<WH5315>, and into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>'s army<WH2428>, that are gone away from you<WH5927>.

Behold <WH6680>, I will command, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and cause them to return<WH7725> to this city<WH5892>; and they shall fight<WH3898> against it<WH3920>, and take it<WH8313>, and burn it with fire<WH784>: and I will make<WH5414> the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> a desolation<WH8077>, without inhabitant<WH3427>.
